compat-change.description: Prevent touches from being consumed by apps if these touches passed through a non-trusted window from a different UID and are considered unsafe.
compat-change.name: BLOCK_UNTRUSTED_TOUCHES

compat-change.description: Check whether apps are using FLAG_SLIPPERY for their windows. We expect that this flag is only used by the system components. If so, we can lock it down.
compat-change.name: BLOCK_FLAG_SLIPPERY
